body.name: Pacifica Beauty, Stress Rehab Coconut & Caffeine Face Mask, Sheet Mask, De-Stress, Reduce Puffiness & Redness, For All Skin Types, Green Tea, Vegan
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 51 mins
features: MOISTURIZING FACIAL MASK FOR ALL SKIN TYPES especially stressed skin that is red and puffy from too many late nights and long weeks
NATURAL FIBER SINGLE USE SHEET MASK helps to rejuvenate and hydrate skin in less than 15 minutes
SKIN LOVING INGREDIENTS like coconut, green tea, and turmeric
WAKE UP YOUR SKIN WITH CAFFEINE and feel how soft your skin can be with the Pacifica Beauty Stress Rehab sheet mask
FREE OF HARSH CHEMICALS including parabens, phthalates and other ingredients you don't want on your skin
100% VEGAN AND CRUELTY-FREE safe for the planet, animals, and you!
body.description: Get into rehab with this mask designed to help de-stress your skin and your mind. Tone and help fight redness and puffiness from too many late nights. Skin loving beneficials include: coconut, caffeine, green tea and turmeric.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Pacifica coconut & caffeine mask is very cooling, and feels like pure goodness on my face. Moisture and calm. It’s very cooling.Pacifica masks always come with lots of extra serum in the pouch, so I pat more onto the drying mask to extend the treatment.I use this mask as well as the green detox mask weekly and definitely do see improvement in my face. A+.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best sheet mask 10/10
reviews.reviewText: The only sheet mask I’ll use. Let’s face it, most sheet masks aren’t gonna do much for you, but they feel great. This mask is the only one where I’ve noticed a steady glow for hours after use. Definitely a great one for before an event or to battle a hangover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sheet mask!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a few of these on a whim and I very quickly can tell why people love them. I was surprised that the mask really is cold when applied (I thought that was just my house, but it seems like the mask is genuinely like this). The smell is very pleasant - it has a very subtle scent of coconut but it isn’t overwhelming.Application was super easy compared to other sheet masks I’ve used in the past. With other sheet masks, sometimes you have to do a complicated dance of figuring out how to even fit it on your face. This one - you just unfold it and it’s basically ready to go. They make it as simple as it should be.Overall, I’ve been turned into a fan and will be repurchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pacifica strikes again with a quality product. Masks work quickly and as expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well but over priced
reviews.reviewText: I love Pacifica but it’s no Clinique they can bring there prices down a tad bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My FAVORITE sheet mask
reviews.reviewText: This is my absolute favorite sheet mask. My skin is sensitive and breaks out with a lot of other face masks, but not this one. Also, this one is a reasonable price. It’s hard to find affordable face products for sensitive skin, but I have a few other products from the Pacifica brand like the glow baby vitamin c serum and they’re all amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Used these after micro needling and it’s soothed and felt great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Forget it all. Live your best life for several minutes or more! Best sheet mask I’ve tried. It left me melted!
